nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't saver be serializer? Saver sounds like it's writing the json to the file or something, but the method returns a JsonElement.

the saver is an object that has a method that converts a list of loot conditions to a json element.
the saver is a singleton, and i am not very sure why mojang even made the saver object, as the only used method is final and only a singleton is ever passed; the used method is only used in one place as well

converts a list of loot conditions to a json element


the saver is a singleton

That sounds exactly like a serializer...
